title: #PrayersForOrlando
itunes:title: #PrayersForOrlando
description:
Prayers and thoughts with Orlando during today's show and all affected by the tragedy at Pulse nightclub. Charlamagne gives a unanimous donkey to the shooter and we get a local feel of the people as our guy D-Strong from 104.3 The Beat checks in from Orlando. Then in true righteous-to-ratchet fashion we ask the burning question: Are strippers still thriving? We'll explain.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
